PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-00992015-02-05,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  FIN,  MINT
ActRoyal Canadian Mint Act
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Issue of Two Twenty-five Cent Circulation Coins Specifying the Characteristics and Determining the Design
PrecisOrder authorizing the issuance of two 25¢ circulation coins with the same design in colour and non-colour to commemorate and promote the 50th Anniversary of the Canadian flag in accordance with the Government of Canada’s priority commemorations for events of broad, national significance in 2015.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0034 Publication Date: 2015-02-25
AttachmentsAttachment
